title: INDUSTRIES AGROALIMENTAIRES (IAA)
description: This program aims to train versatile engineers for the agri-food sector. Through the acquisition of scientific, technical, and managerial skills, IAA engineers are capable of mobilizing resources, both human and material, to solve complex problems faced by agri-food companies.
access_conditions: Minimum entry requirements include a Bachelor's degree in related fields such as Chemistry or Life Sciences. Additional details may vary, contact the university for specific admission criteria.
